metadata.name: "Selfie From The Front Line."
metadata.description:
Pierre sat huddled in the muddy trench, clutching his phone tightly in his hand. He scrolled through old photos of his family, desperate for a moment of solace amidst the chaos of war.

As he shivered from the cold air, he heard gunfire echoing in the distance. He wanted to take a selfie to show his family that he was still alive, but he hesitated. What if he was caught? What if the enemy saw him?

Despite his fears, he raised his phone to take a quick photo. As he lowered the phone, he saw movement in a window from the building across the courtyard. The enemy had spotted him!

Pierre's heart raced as he realized the danger he was in...
